screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Walmart shopping page with a search bar for "acer predator". A laptop is displayed, with options for pickup or delivery, and a "Save with" discount highlighted. There's also a sponsored product for an Acer Spin 513 Chromebook with a lower price and 2-day shipping option. The page also shows the shopping cart with one item and a total price.
action_think: The user wants to add the Acer Predator to the shopping cart on Walmart. I need to find the Acer Predator laptop in the search results and add it to the cart.
action_plan: Scroll up to find the Acer Predator laptop in the search results.
Click on the Acer Predator laptop to go to its product page.
Scroll down to find the 'Add to cart' button.
Click on the 'Add to cart' button to add the Acer Predator to the shopping cart.
action_result: By scrolling up, you have accessed the sponsored products section on the Walmart website. This action has helped to bring more product options into view, which can make it easier for you to find the Acer Predator laptop you want to add to your cart.
